mapper.insert: insert into pmt_payment_way ( id, payment_channel_id, name, code, app_id, encryption_mode, payment_gateway_url, payment_callback_url, payment_return_page_url, secret_key, public_key, credit_path, credit_key, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{paymentChannelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encryptionMode,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler}, #{paymentGatewayUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentCallbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentReturnPageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publicKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update pmt_payment_way
payment_channel_id = #{paymentChannelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
encryption_mode = #{encryptionMode,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler},
payment_gateway_url = #{paymentGatewayUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_callback_url = #{paymentCallbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
payment_return_page_url = #{paymentReturnPageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
secret_key = #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
public_key = #{publicKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
credit_path = #{creditPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
credit_key = #{creditKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pmt_payment_way set payment_channel_id = #{paymentChannelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, encryption_mode = #{encryptionMode,typeHandler=com.siebre.basic.enumutil.EnumStatusHandler}, payment_gateway_url = #{paymentGatewayUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_callback_url = #{paymentCallbackUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, payment_return_page_url = #{paymentReturnPageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, secret_key = #{secretKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, public_key = #{publicKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_path = #{creditPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_key = #{creditKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select , ,
from pmt_payment_way left join pmt_payment_interface on pmt_payment_interface.payment_way_id = pmt_payment_way.id left join pmt_payment_channel on pmt_payment_way.payment_channel_id = pmt_payment_channel.id where pmt_payment_way.code = #{payWayCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
